answers.answer: Omg , I hope that does not happen to me . Lol! I have a feeling my son is going to.measure big when I go to my appt Thursday :/ lord please help me! I also hope I do not get preeclampsia because they will transfer me to a high risk doctor :(
Lol it happens, that's big though. i was due the 6 of October having my son Monday due to him being big as well.
My baby is also very big.  She weighed 2 pounds at 20 weeks.  Now I'm 27 weeks.  I'm due December 20th but the doctor said i could give birth at the end of November.

I'm due in three days and will probably be induced. Yesterday my baby is weighing 8lbs 6oz! Just some advice: make sure youare getting exercise! If they say your baby is big now, just wait! that extra weight will take a toll I promise you! Good luck!
Im 33 wks and my doc said the baby is measuring 2 wks ahead of time and weighing almost 5lbs but they wont change my date! ;-(

question: Back from the doctors and she says I'm having a big baby?? What lol! My due date went from the 29th to the 6th of January!!! Crazy!
title: Big baby???? lol what
